label: 仮名手本忠臣蔵
対訳語: A copybook of the treasury of loyal retainers
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 4:  Early Modern Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1991
見出し読み: かなでほんちゅうしんぐら
説明文: [A] masterful eleven-act puppet play, [on the revenge of the forty-seven rōnin published in 1748, which] became the most famous play in the history of both the kabuki and the puppet theater and has since inspired countless modern plays, films, and television dramas (p. 758). [四十七士、赤穂浪士、歌舞伎、浄瑠璃]
